content: For release on delivery  Noon EDT (9:00 a.m. local time)  March 23, 2011        Community Banking in a Period of Recovery and Change             Remarks by       Ben S. Bernanke       Chairman       Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System       at the       Independent Community Bankers of America National Convention       San Diego, California       March 23, 2011
